byline.original: By AUGUR Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Augur on German aims in Africa; repts Hitler demands Vichy Govt permit German use of French colonial troops to attack Brit
snippet: LONDON, Oct. 31--Chancellor Hitler is said to demand of the Petain government in France the transfer to German control of native troops in French West Africa....

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: NAZIS SAID TO SEEK VICHY AID IN AFRICA; Hitler Reported Demanding Use of France's Colonial Troops to Attack British LAVAL HELD TO FAVOR IDEA Others in Petain Cabinet Are Believed to Oppose Plan for Conquest of Continent

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 31--Chancellor Hitler is said to demand of the Petain government in France the transfer to German control of native troops in French West Africa.
